name: Cownight
description:
Story

A little girl was playing in the darkness of the night, by the light of the moon and the stars, when suddenly an uknown light that shined like the rainbow tried to abduct her. 

But.. her friends the cows where there to sacrify for her. And that's how her story starts...

How to play 

Press space bar to start the game, then wait a few seconds for the controls to show, then press:

  • O: to move left.
  • P: to move right.
  • Q: to unhide
  • A: to hide

Gesture

As we are taking part in the CPCRetroDev contest, this year we must reference the game Rainbow Islands by Ocean by adding a rainbow in our gameplay. 

Our Ovni shoots a rainbow to abduct our player.
